mapper.insert: INSERT INTO im_tribe ( owner_uid, owner_name, owner_headimg, tribe_id, tribe_img, tribe_type, tribe_category, name, introduction, location, location_name, auto_invite ) SELECT u.uid, u.nickname, u.headimgurl, #{tribeId}, #{tribeImg}, #{tribeType}, #{tribeCategory}, #{name}, #{introduction}, #{location}, #{locationName}, #{autoInvite} FROM system_user u WHERE u.uid = #{ownerUid}
mapper.select: SELECT tid, tribe_id, tribe_img, tribe_type, tribe_category, owner_uid, owner_name, owner_headimg, NAME, introduction, location, coord_type, location_name, create_time, auto_invite FROM im_tribe WHERE tribe_id=#{tribeId}
mapper.update:

name = #{name},
tribe_img = #{tribeImg},
tribe_type = #{tribeType},
introduction = #{introduction},
location = #{location},
location_name = #{locationName},
